text: Saat Bhai Champa is a Bengali television Soap Opera that premiered on November 27, 2017 and airs on Zee Bangla. It is produced by Surinder Films and stars Rudrajit Mukherjee and Promita Chakrabartty ( Later Roosha Chatterjee was replaced )in Lead roles and Sudipa Banerjee in a negative role. ==Cast== *Rudrajit Mukherjee as Raghav (Senapati Raghvendra) /Main Male Lead *Promita Chakrabartty as Parul (Main Female Lead) / Roosha Chaterjee as new Parul ( Cameo character) *Samrat Mukherjee as Mahendra & Surendra *Solanki Roy / Sonali Chowdhury as Rani Padmavati *Sudipa Banerjee as Rani Monimallicka (Main Antagonist) *Koshturi Chattopadhyay as Tontromata *Manosi Sengupta as Rani Swetanghshi *Liza Goswami as Rani Lolontika *Sayantani Guthakurta as Rani Dakahini *Priyanka Rati Pal / Ishani Sengupta as Rani Bonhisikha *Mayna Banerjee as Dhaimaa Gayentri *Nayana Bandyopadhyay as Rani Maya & Motshokonna Sonkhomala *Shyambhavi as Mukta (Daughter of Rani Maya) *Rupsha Mukhopadhyay as Rani Urmimala *Tania Ganguly / Kanyakumari Mukherjee as Nagkonnya Komolini *Boni Mukherjee as Arundhati (Mother of Senapati Raghvendra) *Sabyasachi Choudhary as Raja Nakshatrajyoti * Madhuboni Goswami as Rani Rukmini * Ria Roy as Daini ==References== *http://www.tellychakkar.com/tv/tv-news/zee-bangla- launches-fantasy-drama-saat-bhai-champa-promita-plays-title-character-171116 *https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/tv/news/bengali/priyanka-rati-pal-loves- the-negative-shades-in-the-tv-characters/articleshow/62984135.cms *https://twchannels.com/saat-bhai-champa-serial-on-zee-bangla-cast-story- images-wiki/ Category:2017 Indian television series debuts
title: Saat Bhai Champa
